it.polimi.se2018

Class DiceBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.DiceBag

  • public class DiceBag
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes DiceBag behavior. A die can be extracted from the bag, inserted in it or switch with another one (not in the bag)
    Author:
    Alessio Molinari, Nives Migotto

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Die extractDie()
      Extracts a random die from the bag
      java.util.ArrayList<Die> getDice() 
      static DiceBag getInstance()
      Singleton
      void insertDie(Die die)
      Inserts a die in the diceBag (queued in last position)
      int size()
      Returns how many dice remain in the bag
      Die switchDie(Die toBeSwitched)
      Switches a die with a random die in diceBag
